text: Ani jevha tyanni apale samana ughadale tevha tyata tyanna apali rakkama adhalali, ji tyanna parata keli geli hoti. Mhanale, he pita! Amhala anakhi kaya pahije? Hi amaci rakkama amhala parata keli geli ahe ani amhi apalya kutumbakarita dhan'ya anuna de'u ani apalya bhavace raksana karu ani eka untace mapa jasta anu. He mapa tara jasta sope ahe
